title: @Meddler: why the fuck can't we completely hide pings from trolls?
body:
Daily reminder that this game is literally unplayable because of people like this. 28 minutes of PING PING PING PING PING all over my screen yes very fun. (I already have the audio muted - I want it ALL hidden).

I'm probably gonna get banned because of the way I react to these people. "Just mute them" - oh wait, I can't.

http://i.imgur.com/8ojPwvM.png/img

replies.body: Instead of expanding the mute command to include pings, they removed the ability of the /ignore command to mute pings as well. Talk about a step backwards, gg Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=T9rQ0xdp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-11T07:05:58.690+0000)
>
> Instead of expanding the mute command to include pings, they removed the ability of the /ignore command to mute pings as well. Talk about a step backwards, gg Riot.

they did that for a reason. if they brought it back, they would also need to bring back "refusing to communicate" as a report option

They did that for a bad reason. When somebody is spam pinging, you're forced to mute pings from everyone in the team instead of just the asshat who's doing it. That breaks down communication even more. 

>if they brought it back, they would also need to bring back "refusing to communicate" as a report option

If they keep it, they have to add "spamming pings" as a report option, and actually act on it with zero tolerance instead of being a placebo option like the "failure to communicate" was. I'll take "kys" and whatever hate speech they want, it doesn't phase me at all. Some of it is even funny. But I'll  be dammed if pings don't tilt the hell out of me.
Your brain is more powerful than their mouse button. Ignore it. Put it out of your mind. Be Zen.
